column5: Here at Top Comments we welcome longtime as well as brand new Daily Kos readers to join us at 10pm Eastern. We strive to nourish community by rounding up some of the site's best funniest most mojo'd & most informative commentary and we depend on your help!! If you see a comment by another Kossack that deserves wider recognition please send it either to topcomments at gmail or to the Top Comments group mailbox by 9:30pm Eastern. Please include a few words about why you sent it in as well as your user name (even if you think we know it already :-) so we can credit you with the find! I am swamped so tonight is open thread night. Carrie...just one scene...and to this day I jump when I see that scene even though I've seen it at least 30 times. https://t.co/iUNHflB4hQ I am willing to bet that everyone who has seen Carrie knows the scene I am referring to. NBC: Major Biden is getting trained for a cat to arrive at the  White House  https://t.co/cRQe5nX3Qf It’s about time! Comments below the fold. Brillig's ObDisclaimer: The decision to publish each nomination lies with the evening's Diarist and/or Comment Formatter. My evenings at the helm I try reeeeallllyy hard to publish everything without regard to content. I really do even when I disagree personally with any given nomination. "TopCommentness" lies in the eyes of the nominator and of you the reader - I leave the decision to you. I do not publish self-nominations (ie your own comments) and if I ruled the world we'd all build community supporting and uplifting instead of tearing our fellow Kossacks down. Please remember that comment inclusion in Top Comments does not constitute support or endorsement by diarist formatter Top Comments writers or DailyKos. Questions complaints or comments? Contact brillig. From inkstainedwretch: A comment by buddha2 points out that Former Guy tries to claim credit for others' work while downplaying his oh so many massive and/or deadly mistakes.  From Egberto Willies recommended post about Ron Klain casting aspersions at Sen. Tim Scott. Top Mojo for yesterday April 29 2021 first comments and tip jars excluded. Thank you mik for the mojo magic! For those of you interested in How Top Mojo Works please see his diary on FAQing Top Mojo. Top Pictures for yesterday April 29 2021. Click any picture to be taken to the full comment or picture. Thank you jotter!
